game.title: Eternal Realms
game.synopsis: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is on the brink of destruction. Players take on the role of a young apprentice who discovers they have the ability to wield ancient magic. As they embark on a journey to uncover the secrets behind the disappearance of magic, they must confront powerful forces seeking to exploit the realm's weakness for their own gain.
game.beginning: The game begins in the small village of Brindlemark, where the player character discovers they have magical abilities after stumbling upon an ancient artifact. As they learn to control their powers, they are approached by a mysterious figure who sets them on a quest to uncover the truth behind the disappearance of magic.
game.ending: After traversing treacherous landscapes and battling formidable foes, the player character discovers that the source of the magical drought is an ancient entity known as the Shadowheart. In a climactic final battle, the player must harness their mastery of magic to defeat the Shadowheart and restore balance to Eridoria.
